data.title: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille
data.meta_description: Perry's has redefined dining with an experience that is truly Rare and Well Done. Now one of the country's premier, award-winning steakhouses, Perry's remains true to its neighborhood butcher shop roots with top quality selection and service.
data.text:
Available for DINE-IN & TO-GO

Off-Menu Favorites

Our Artichoke, Potato and Leek Soup with Truffle Oil, The Three Kings Mignon, Orange Vanilla Cream Cheesecake, Perry's Reserve Texas Akaushi Wagyu and Koji-Aged Steaks. Available for a Limited Time.

See the Menu

*Tax plus 15% handling fee applied to food TO-GO purchases. NO GRATUITY NECESSARY.

Available for DINE-IN upon request Every Day before 6 PM.

Perry's Senior Menu: 3 courses, 6 choices, $39*

Guests ages 65+ can join us at Perry's any day before 6 PM upon request only. Reservations Required.

See the Menu

*Menu upon request only for DINE-IN every day, before 6 PM for guests age 65+. Reservations are required and are limited to 1.5 hours. Tax & gratuity are not included. Perryâ€™s Senior Menu is NOT available on promotional holidays or for private dining events.
